nodes.text: A renowned agricultural baron was present in the Canto Casino in the city Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica in 34 ABY. After receiving a single coin from the Suerton gambler Wodi, whom he had just lost a game of zinbiddle to, the Heptooinian gambler Kaljach Sonmi angrily threw the coin, which landed in the cocktail glass of the surprised agricultural baron. Sonmi, who worked at the Canto Casino as a proposition player, later supposed the coin landing in the baron's glass to be one of the reasons he was quickly fired. The bartender Ganzer, a friend of Sonmi's, retrieved the coin from the baron's glass and later returned it to the Heptooinian.

The agricultural baron was first mentioned in John Jackson Miller's 2017 short story "The Ride" in the novella collection Canto Bight, which was released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi multimedia project.
